definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: The rail tanker has to be washed, before it is loaded.
sentences.chinese: 鐵路槽車在裝產品之前，必須進行清洗。

sentences.english: Be responsible for the maintenance of Distribution Tanker.
The cleaning necessity of new train tanker of purifying methanol were described.
sentences.chinese: 敘述精甲醇火車槽車啓用前進行清洗的必要性。

sentences.english: Transported using special truck or ship when it is in liquid form.
sentences.chinese: 液態時，以專用汽車槽車或專用輪船運輸。
